definitions.definition: A strip of gauze or similar material used to protect or support a wound or injury .
A strip of cloth bound round the head and eyes as a blindfold .
A provisional or makeshift solution that provides insufficient coverage or relief .
examples: This new healthcare proposal merely applies a bandage to the current medical crisis.

main_definition: A strip of gauze or similar material used to protect or support a wound or injury .
secondary_definitions: A strip of cloth bound round the head and eyes as a blindfold .
( figuratively , by extension ) A provisional or makeshift solution that provides insufficient coverage or relief .
